project_name.justification: The article is titled: "Summa Silver Announces Staking of the High-Grade Gold-Silver Kennedy Project, Nevada".

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as "Summa Silver Corp. (TSXV: SSVR) (OTCQX: SSVRF) (FSE: 48X) ("Summa" or the "Company")".

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO is identified at the end of the press release: '"Galen McNamara" Galen McNamara, Chief Executive Officer'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states: "The Kennedy Project consists of 99 mineral claims spanning approximately 2,000 acres, is 100% owned by the Company, and is free of any royalties."

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative metadata provided in the prompt specifies "Au" as the primary commodity. The article confirms the presence of gold: "mined grades were reported to be 15 g/t Au and 311 g/t Ag2."

verified_article_link.justification: The article is about the Kennedy Project, which is the project of interest. The source link is provided at the end of the text: "To view the source version of this press release, please visit https://www.newsfilecorp.com/release/242579".

currency.justification: The project was acquired via "low-cost claim staking" and no financial consideration (cash or shares) was mentioned for the acquisition itself.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The project was acquired via "low-cost claim staking," not a cash payment.

share_payments_raw.justification: The project was acquired via "low-cost claim staking," not a share payment.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The project was acquired via "low-cost claim staking," not a combined cash and share payment.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The project was acquired via "low-cost claim staking," not by issuing shares.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the acquisition terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the acquisition terms.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the acquisition.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions exploration plans but does not specify a commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text outlines future exploration plans but does not state a specific monetary exploration commitment as part of the acquisition terms.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text explicitly states the project is "free of any royalties."

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states: "The Kennedy Project consists of 99 mineral claims spanning approximately 2,000 acres..."

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text states: "The Kennedy Project consists of 99 mineral claims spanning approximately 2,000 acres..."

resource_size.justification: The text mentions a "1M ounce near surface gold target" but does not provide a formal mineral resource estimate with tonnage and grade.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text identifies the company and its ticker: "Summa Silver Corp. (TSXV: SSVR) (OTCQX: SSVRF) (FSE: 48X)".
